    All Classes and Interfaces

    Class
    Description
    BattleRoyale
    Represents a single Battle Royale game definition, including its unique ID, scenarios, settings, lifecycle callbacks and current state.
    BattleRoyale.BattleRoyaleBuilder
    Builder for BattleRoyale instances, providing a fluent API to configure scenarios, settings, and lifecycle callbacks.
    BattleRoyaleEngine
    Legacy engine responsible for validating and registering BattleRoyale definitions.
    BattleRoyaleItem
    Base type for custom Battle Royale items with optional crafting recipes.
    BattleRoyaleState
    Represents the lifecycle state of a Battle Royale session.
    BorderConsumer
    Collects and manages custom world border configuration for scenarios.
    CommandConsumer
    Collects Brigadier command nodes to be registered for a scenario.
    CommandRegistry
    Registry for deferred registration of Brigadier commands.
    Config
    Simple in-memory configuration model backed by a single YAML file.
    Config.Field<T>
    Immutable key/value pair representing a configuration entry.
    Database
    Simple asynchronous SQLite database helper for RoyaleCore.
    Experimental
    Marks an API element as experimental and subject to change or removal.
    FailedBRRegistry
    Registry tracking BattleRoyale instances that failed validation or registration.
    ItemConsumer
    Collects BattleRoyaleItem instances used by a scenario.
    ListenerConsumer
    Collects Bukkit Listener instances for later registration.
    ListenerRegistry
    Registry for deferred registration of Bukkit Listener instances.
    Main
    Main plugin entry point for RoyaleCore.
    MarkedForRemoval
    Marks an API element as deprecated and planned for removal in a future version.
    MessageConsumer
    Holds configurable messages used by scenarios or battles.
    NewEngine
    New engine responsible for managing battle royale sessions and state.
    NotForDeveloperUse
    Marks an API element as internal and not intended for direct use by plugin developers.
    PlayerConsumer
    Consumer for per-player operations associated with a scenario.
    RecipeRegistry
    Registry for deferred registration of Recipe instances.
    ResourcePackConsumer
    Handles resource pack operations such as adding packs and sending them to players.
    Result
    Represents the outcome of an operation within the RoyaleCore API.
    Result.Broadcast
    Aggregates multiple Result instances and prints them together.
    Result.Err
    Error Result carrying an error message, an optional exception, and a debug-only flag.
    Result.Ok
    Successful Result carrying an optional success message and a debug-only flag.
    Scenario
    Represents a single scenario definition for a Battle Royale game.
    Scenario.ScenarioBuilder
    Builder for Scenario instances, providing a fluent configuration API.
    ScenarioPriority
    Priority levels used to order or resolve scenarios.
    SchedulerConsumer
    Collects scheduled tasks associated with a scenario or battle.
    SchedulerConsumer.ScheduleWindow
    Describes a scheduling window using optional start and stop offsets.
    SchematicUtils
    Holds some utility methods for the StructureConsumer
    SettingsConsumer
    Consumer for scenario or battle settings, backed by a simple key-value map.
    SettingsConsumer.LateJoinHandling
    Strategies for handling players who join after the game has started.
    SettingsConsumer.Setting
    Well-known settings for scenarios and battles.
    StructureConsumer
    Consumes and manages schematic structures for automatic placement in a world.
    UnstableOnServerStart
    Marks an API element as unstable during server startup and subject to change.
